-   [`ggplot2` cheat sheet](
https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/html/data-visualization.html): a collection of all `ggplot2` geoms and the arguments they take.
- malariaAtlas [package](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/malariaAtlas/index.html) and [documentation](https://github.com/malaria-atlas-project/malariaAtlas/blob/master/README.md): R package that includes many shapefiles and other data from the Malaria Atlas Project 
- Malaria Atlas Project [data training](https://malaria-atlas-project.gitlab.io/intro-to-spatial-analysis-for-infectious-diseases/): Extensive training curriculum on spatial malaria data in R.
